title: Matplotlib Affine Transformation
description: This lab demonstrates how to use Matplotlib to perform affine transformation of an image. Affine transformations change the shape and orientation of an image. This lab shows how to use the transforms.Affine2D function to manipulate the shape and orientation of an image.

meta.title: Matplotlib Affine Transformation: A Comprehensive Guide
meta.description: Explore the power of Matplotlib's affine transformation to manipulate image shape and orientation.
meta.keywords: image manipulation, matplotlib, python, data visualization, affine transformation
